summary: Updates the names of most Redguards in the game to longer, lore friendly Arabic ones.
descriptionHtml:
This mod edits the names of Redguards in the base game and dlc's to be closer to the Arabic names.

The names are based on the Andalusian (Spanish Muslim) model of naming as the Redguards most closely resemble the Moors of Iberia.
Naming conventions taken from: https://goo.gl/Zd3Tfs

Examples:
Nazeem Al-Whiterun Juz-Alhind (Nazeem of Whiterun, the Cocunut)
Armen Al-Sahara Almualia (Armen of the desert, the Loyal)
Anwen Abd-Dibella Bint-Hamal (Anwen, servant of Dibella, daughter of Hamal)

More important Redguards such as Isran and Nazir have longer names, for example:
Almabarizalzzalam Nazir Min-Alssahra'Alhumra'a Abd-Sithis ( The Dark Swordsman, Nazir, Of the Red Desert, Slave of Sithis)


The translations aren't always 100% accurate but unless you speak Arabic you won't notice.

Enjoy
author: Dovahenry
